athena:
Bjetslice, ttbar, pu40, IBL, run2 chains BjetSlice, ttbar, pu40, IBL, run2 chains EventMax=900;runMergedChain=True;globalTag='OFLCOND-RUN12-SDR-17' TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_BjetSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_bjet_sample0.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-bjet-pileup-merging.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-bjet-pileup-merging.root data-bjet-pileup-merging.root EF_b55_NoCut_j55_a4tchad_IDT_InDetTrigParticleCreation_Bjet_EFID EF_b55_NoCut_j55_a4tchad_IDT_TrigFastTrackFinder_Jet -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-bjet-pileup-merging.root data-bjet-IBL-pu40-reference.root HLT_j55_bperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_Jet HLT_j55_bperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Bjet_EFID HLT_j55_EFID_bperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Bjet_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
TIDAdata*.dat data-bjet-pileup-reference.root data-bjet-IBL-pu40-reference.root expert-monitoring-bjet_IBL_pu40_run2-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" Test_bin.dat
